result.title: WA in TimusOJ
result.content: I am solving problem Electrification Pan in TimusOJ. My approach was to calculate shortest path between any pair using Floyd warshall algo and then calculate min cost from each vertex to the vertices with power station and add them . But unfortunately it gives WA. My Solution in Ideone. Please point out my mistake :) Thanks UPD: Still I cannot solve this problem( 19/08/2015 )
